title: Print some square matrix elements - write code

content.prompt: Which of the following can be used to replace /* missing code */ so that the code segment works as intended?

choices.label:
for (int c = 0; c <= r; c++) 
{
   System.out.print(mat[c][r] + " ");
}
System.out.println();

for (int c = 0; c <= r; c++) 
{
   System.out.print(mat[r][c] + " "); 
}
System.out.println();

for (int c = 1; c < r; c++) 
{
   System.out.print(mat[r][c] + " ");
} 
System.out.println();

for (int c = 0; c <= r; c++) 
{ 
   System.out.print(mat[r][c] + " "); 
   System.out.println(); 
}

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
